=== Why does this team exist ===
 Upstream Bugs team, is a group of bug triagers who decided to focus on enhancing communication between Up and Downstream processes as the backbone of Ubuntu development.

=== What we do ===
Simply, we deal with bug reports' needs with upstream BTSs.

=== How to Join ===
==== Requirements: ====
1. A member of BugSquad.
2. History of dealing with upstream bugs.

If you completed the previous steps, go ahead and <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/upstream-bugs/+join|apply]]</nowiki> for membership on the UpstreamBugsTeam at Launchpad, then, send your CV to :::, including the following:
 
* A link to your profile in Launchpad.net <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/me|Your profile here]]</nowiki>
* Links to 3 bug reports that you have handled their upstream needs.
